name: EditorID
description: Returns the editor ID of record `id`.  Returns an empty string if the record does not have an editor ID.

name: FullName
description: Returns the FULL name of record `id`.  Returns an empty string if the record does not have an FULL name.

args.name: id
args.description: Handle of a record which is a placed object.

args.name: vector
args.description: Object with X, Y, and Z float properties.

args.name: id
args.description: Handle of a record which is a placed object.

args.name: vector
args.description: Object with X, Y, and Z float properties.

name: GetRecordFlag
description: Gets the state of record flag `name` on record `id`.

name: SetRecordFlag
description: Sets record flag `name` on record `id` to `state`.
